---
desc: Code Fences
---

should render html script block
.

```html_script
<script>test</script>
<style>p { margin: 50em }</style>
```

.
<ac:structured-macro ac:macro-id="tox75" ac:name="html" ac:schema-version="1">
  <ac:plain-text-body>
    <![CDATA[<script>test</script>
<style>p { margin: 50em }</style>
]]>
  </ac:plain-text-body>
</ac:structured-macro>
.
